article_metadata.news-keywords: mental health, treatment, depression, stanislaus county, behavioral health
article_metadata.description: Economic calamity has a crushing effect on a community’s mental health, resulting in more people seeking treatment for mental illnesses, ranging in severity from depression to suicidal.
